original: 吳郡富春人，東吳宗室，孫策堂兄。孫策死後，孫暠意圖自立，被虞翻警告勸阻而作罷。另，東吳後期權臣孫峻、孫綝皆為孫暠之孫。
text: Wu Jun Fuchun, Dongwu clan, cousin Sun Ce. After Sun Ce's death, Sun Hao intended to stand on his own, but was dissuaded by the warning from Yu. In addition, Sun Jun and Sun Wei, post-Soochow option ministers, are both grandsons of Sun Hao.
